title: Weaver's Thesis Book
inscribed: paper label in frint with pencil inscription; "F.W.Wendt".
creditline: Gift of The Cleveland Museum of Art
description: Book with German text discussing fibers and weave structures illustrated with diagrama on graph paper. (No fabric samples in this book).

tombstone.epitaph:
Weaver's Thesis Book.
H x W x D: 32 x 21.5 x 5.5 cm (12 5/8 x 8 7/16 x 2 3/16 in.). Gift of The Cleveland Museum of Art. 1983-63-3.
